publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3873 Margaret Jamieson: Tinnitus Week—That the Parliament commends the British Tinnitus Association and the RNID for working together to organise National Tinnitus Week from 20 to 26 February 2006 to raise public awareness of tinnitus, make people with tinnitus aware of the assistance available at hospitals around the United Kingdom, encourage more sufferers to seek help, bring the condition to the attention of those at risk of tinnitus and help to ensure that more GPs are informed about the services and information available to them and their patients.

S2M-3873 Tinnitus Week (lodged on 25 January 2006) Mary Scanlon*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Sarah Boyack*, Cathie Craigie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mike Pringle*, Kate Maclean*, Trish Godman*, Janis Hughes*, Marlyn Glen*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Irene Oldfather*, Christine May*

S2M-3873 Margaret Jamieson: Tinnitus Week—That the Parliament commends the British Tinnitus Association and the RNID for working together to organise National Tinnitus Week from 20 to 26 February 2006 to raise public awareness of tinnitus, make people with tinnitus aware of the assistance available at hospitals around the United Kingdom, encourage more sufferers to seek help, bring the condition to the attention of those at risk of tinnitus and help to ensure that more GPs are informed about the services and information available to them and their patients. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Mr Jim Wallace, Sarah Boyack, Cathie Craigie, Nora Radcliffe, Mike Pringle, Kate Maclean, Trish Godman, Janis Hughes, Marlyn Glen, Karen Gillon, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Irene Oldfather, Christine May, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Des McNulty*, Bristow Muldoon*, Margaret Smith*, Helen Eadie*
S2M-3873 Tinnitus Week (lodged on 25 January 2006) Jackie Baillie*
S2M-3873 Tinnitus Week (lodged on 25 January 2006) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-3873 Tinnitus Week (lodged on 25 January 2006) Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S2M-3873 Tinnitus Week (lodged on 25 January 2006) Donald Gorrie*, John Swinburne*
S2M-3873 Tinnitus Week (lodged on 25 January 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-3873 Tinnitus Week (lodged on 25 January 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3873 Tinnitus Week (lodged on 25 January 2006) Susan Deacon*
S2M-3873 Tinnitus Week (lodged on 25 January 2006) Cathy Peattie*
